TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DefaultValueSourceLocation extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Determines whether the default value for a property is set at the bottom or the top of the project file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.DefaultValueSourceLocation AfterContext = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The default value for a property is set at the bottom of the project file (usually via an import of a .targets file, where the property definition is conditional on whether the property has not already been defined.)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.DefaultValueSourceLocation BeforeContext = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The default value for a property is set at the top of the project file (usually via an import of a .props file).
